members.signatureAfterChange: public JUnitTestRunner(JUnitTest test, boolean haltOnError,                            boolean filtertrace, boolean haltOnFailure,                            boolean showOutput, ClassLoader loader)
diff: -                // check if there is a suite method
-                // no appropriate suite method found. We don't report any
-                // error here since it might be perfectly normal.
-                // if there is a suite method available, then try

members.signatureBeforeChange: public JUnitTestRunner(JUnitTest test, boolean haltOnError,                            boolean haltOnFailure, ClassLoader loader)
members.signatureAfterChange: public JUnitTestRunner(JUnitTest test, boolean haltOnError,                            boolean haltOnFailure, ClassLoader loader)
diff: +                // check if there is a suite method
+                // no appropriate suite method found. We don't report any
+                // error here since it might be perfectly normal. We don't
+                // know exactly what is the cause, but we're doing exactly
+                // the same as JUnit TestRunner do. We swallow the exceptions.
+                // if there is a suite method available, then try
+                // to extract the suite from it. If there is an error
+                // here it will be caught below and reported.
